# Security Policy

## Code Scanning

This repository uses Advanced CodeQL setup. See [docs/CODE_SCANNING.md](../docs/CODE_SCANNING.md) for configuration details.

**Security maintainers:** Changes to `.github/workflows/codeql.yml` require approval from @Ritenoob.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it by:

1. Opening a private security advisory on GitHub
2. Or contacting the repository maintainers directly

Please do not open public issues for security vulnerabilities.
